alert.note: Alert for Coastal Collier County; Hendry; Inland Collier County; Mainland Monroe (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 06 at 3:16PM EST by NWS Miami
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Collier, northern Mainland Monroe and southeastern Hendry Counties through 345 PM EST... At 316 PM EST, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Hendry Correctional to 10 miles northwest of Big Cypress National Preserve to Everglades City. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Chokoloskee, Everglades City, Plantation Island, Big Cypress Seminole Reservation, Carnestown, Big Cypress National Preserve, Copeland, and Jerome. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Collier County; Hendry; Inland Collier County; Mainland Monroe
